segments.text: I notice the boy stretching so far to reach the cookies, and I’m worried he’s going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to collapse under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting patiently, like this is normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water spreading across the floor, and the woman hasn’t even noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s too focused on drying that plate to see anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside, it’s a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t hurt himself when he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I should probably warn them, but I don’t want to scare them either.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a strange scene—no one seems to care about what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
